channel.title: Compiling firmware
channel.description:
getting this at the end of compile?
"setup build dir" "Compiling firmware..." 'make' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. 'make' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. "Compiling firmware flasher..." 'make' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Link to firmware CRC E5C6C240 Done compiling firmware

item.title: Compiling firmware
item.dc:creator: @martindunne martin
item.description:
@martindunne wrote:

sorry yep wrong folder works like a charm. many thanks for your help

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling firmware
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

also can you confirmed you installed the runtime, as described in this thread : http://community.axoloti.com/t/installing-on-windows

you should have the directory C:\Program Files (x86)\axoloti_runtime\platform_win

whilst you won't need it to compile the firmware, as that is already supplied built, you will need it to compile patches.

EDIT: Ive pushed a fix, so the user will be informed if its not been correctly installed... I guess for 1.0.2 ?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling firmware
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

You're on windows I guess?
What's your motivation to compile firmware? Normally this is not needed. The menu item to compile firmware should have been invisible, that is a known issue (of today).

Read full topic
